hmm, Google being assurance?
28

2



Sinisa Rudan














Hassan Trabelsi



·Follow




Aug 24, 2023








--



1







Listen









Share













Hmm, You have a valid argument, but my point in the article was to highlight the benefits of having a major player like Google backing a technology. Often, this backing provides a level of stability and resources that smaller organizations might not be able to offer. Moreover, Google, being one of the top companies in the tech field, having some of the most capable engineers out there continuously working to improve and innovate, the ongoing development of Angular and the recent release of V16 further demonstrates their commitment to the framework.














--






--

Often, this backing provides a level of stability and resources that smaller organizations might not be able to offer. Moreover, Google, being one of the top companies in the tech field, having some of the most capable engineers out there continuously working to improve and innovate, the ongoing development of Angular and the recent release of V16 further demonstrates their commitment to the framework.</p>
